title: Re-enable the backupAgent.
message:
Re-enable the backupAgent.

It turns out that a backupAgent actually does inhibit fullbackup (and
the resulting service death), provided that you reset the fullbackup
queue by rebooting the device.

title: Disable the backup feature entirely.
message:
Disable the backup feature entirely.

Downgrading to targetSdkVersion 22 broke the Play Store upgrade process,
so this is my only remaining option.

title: Increment version code to 20.
message:
Increment version code to 20.

19 was never released, but I was experimenting with the Play Store's alpha
test feature.

title: Delete the spinner_dropdown color hack.
message:
Delete the spinner_dropdown color hack.

This is no longer needed, because ActionBarCompat is now able to render
the white-on-black spinner correctly in API 8.

title: Roll back to targetSdkVersion 22
message:
Roll back to targetSdkVersion 22

This turns "bmgr fullbackup net.pmarks.chromadoze" into a no-op, which
will hopefully fix the bug where Android 6.0 kills the service in the
middle of the night.

title: Fix some warnings.
message: Fix some warnings.

title: Add a simple BackupAgent.
message:
Add a simple BackupAgent.

Hopefully, this will prevent Android 6.0 from killing the service in the
middle of the night.

title: Set version to 3.5.2
message: Set version to 3.5.2

title: Update to JTransforms 3.1
message:
Update to JTransforms 3.1

To reduce third-party dependencies, all parts of this library not
required for float IDCT have been deleted.

title: Update to targetSdkVersion 23
message: Update to targetSdkVersion 23

title: Use START_REDELIVER_INTENT, so Android will restart the service if the
message:
Use START_REDELIVER_INTENT, so Android will restart the service if the
kernel decides to kill it for whatever reason.

Whenever the service is stopped or restarted, add some text to the main
interface indicating why.

title: Delete unnecessary volume scaling.
message:
Delete unnecessary volume scaling.

The setStereoVolume() documentation says 0.0 is silence, and 1.0 is
unity gain, so scaling by the Min/Max is redundant.

title: Update "readme" for Android Studio, and delete a redundant COPYING file.
message: Update "readme" for Android Studio, and delete a redundant COPYING file.

title: Remove IDEA-specific junk from version control.
message:
Remove IDEA-specific junk from version control.

It's not required to run a Gradle build, and Android Studio generates
this stuff automatically when you import the project.

title: Pin support/appcompat to a more-specific version.
message:
Pin support/appcompat to a more-specific version.

These libraries have made breaking changes in the past, so it makes
sense for major updates to need human intervention.

title: Tag version 3.5.1
message:
Tag version 3.5.1

This version has no new features, but now it builds with Android Studio,
and the About screen points to the new GitHub URL.

title: Run "Reformat Code..."
message: Run "Reformat Code..."

title: Give up on Android 2.1 (API 7).
message:
Give up on Android 2.1 (API 7).

Android Studio considers it "deprecated", and something (perhaps the
Toolbar) is causing a mysterious crash on startup.

message: Fix some lint warnings.

title: - Add option to disable AudioFocus.
message:
- Add option to disable AudioFocus.
- Add option to reduce the volume level internally.

The idea is that you can play white noise on top of music, in order
to drown out background chatter during the quiet parts.

title: - Set version to 3.2
message: - Set version to 3.2

title: - Fix a memory leak in requestAudioFocus() / abandonAudioFocus().
message: - Fix a memory leak in requestAudioFocus() / abandonAudioFocus().

title: - Add a ShuffleBag class to prevent near-consecutive replays of the same chunk.
message:
- Add a ShuffleBag class to prevent near-consecutive replays of the same chunk.
- Fix a stereo glitch when mChunk0 and mChunk1 differ in size.
- Add withPcm() function to avoid lots of repeated code.
- Misc cleanups.

title: - Implement stereo sound, by playing the same data backwards.
message: - Implement stereo sound, by playing the same data backwards.

title: - Respect the Audio Focus on >=Froyo
message:
- Respect the Audio Focus on >=Froyo
- Watch for STOP/PAUSE media buttons, mainly for Sleep Timer compatibility.

title: - Turn "singleTask" back on, so the Notification still works correctly even
message:
- Turn "singleTask" back on, so the Notification still works correctly even
  if we launched from the .apk installer.
- Hopefully this marks the 3.1 release.

title: - Add a retry loop which might fix the mTrack.play() crash.
message: - Add a retry loop which might fix the mTrack.play() crash.

message: - Update screenshots for v3.1

message:
- Update icons.
- Add a stop button to the notification bar for >= ICS
- Make the notification Intent less weird.

title: - SampleShuffler: replace callback spaghetti with an explicit loop.
message: - SampleShuffler: replace callback spaghetti with an explicit loop.

title: - New icons, for eventual use.
message: - New icons, for eventual use.

title: - Update screenshots
message: - Update screenshots

title: - If the service is killed due to memory pressure, let it stay dead.
message:
- If the service is killed due to memory pressure, let it stay dead.
  Previously it would restart and immediately NPE because I increased
  targetSdkVersion without migrating to onStartCommand().
- Hopefully this commit marks the 3.0 release.

message:

message:

title: Run as a foreground service.  This makes the OS less likely to kill the
message:
Run as a foreground service.  This makes the OS less likely to kill the
process while it's busy making noise.

title: - Make sure the buffer is never smaller than getMinBufferSize(), since
message:
- Make sure the buffer is never smaller than getMinBufferSize(), since
  I'm not sure my default is appropriate for every device.
- Add a progress bar for block generation.
- Manage the wake lock and notification icon in onCreate/onDestroy, since
  those callbacks are always paired 1:1.
- Get rid of the special layout for landscape; it was ugly and pointless.
